div.class: inner col col12 first last id7a7a29b7-6977-4946-98fd-8e775f237f8a

li.div: Due to the unknown of COVID-19, Secretary of State Raffensberger has postponed the elections that were scheduled for May 19, 2020 until June 9, 2020. Early Voting is scheduled to begin Monday, May 18, 2020.

h4.a: Don't forget to complete the Census!

li.div: In the midst of all the COVID-19 issues, don't forget to complete the Census. Did you know that the Census is what helps determine how much funding is sent to the County?
A new Executive Order has been signed by Governor Kemp and now has been extended until May 13, 2020. Read on...
